name: Infrequent Buyer
description: A customer who purchases goods, on average, less than once every 3 months

name: VIP
description: A customer who is responsible for over 1% of our total sales

name: Whale
description: A customer who is responsible for over 5% of our total sales

name: High Value Buyer
description: A regular customer who buys more than our threshold value of goods per month

name: Low Value Buyer
description: A regular customer who buys less than our threshold value of goods per month
